question: In the reaction
Aniline <katex>$\xrightarrow{NaNO_2/dil. HCl}$</katex> P <katex>$\xrightarrow{Phenol/NaOH}$</katex> Q.
'Q' is:
explanation: Aniline reacts with <katex>$NaNO_2/HCl$</katex> to form benzene diazonium chloride (P). Coupling of (P) with phenol in an alkaline medium (NaOH) occurs predominantly at the para-position to form p-hydroxyazobenzene (Q), which is an orange dye.
